Posts.Content: my Mom had breast cancer, underwent a masectomy and will be starting Taxol treatments soon. i've heard that there are some serious side effects like severe joint pain. is this true? what other side effects are there? i'm really scared because i've researched it and found that there have been fatalities due to Taxol. please, if you have ANY information, please let me know... thank you.
Posts.Title: important questions about TAXOL....

Posts.Content: thank you so much NIE... it really scared me to hear about all the 'horror stories' of Taxol, but it's not as bad as it seems i guess. i will check out that USA Today report. thank you again. your Mom is in my prayers. God bless... in Christ, Exaura
Posts.Title: important questions about TAXOL....

Posts.Content: Thank you so very much... I have shared all of this with my Mom and she is still in good spirits. She also thanks you very much for your response, it is greatly appreciated! You are in our prayers. Take care and God bless. in Christ, Exaura
